resources.string:
Many of us would love to be promoted.


Advancement usually means more influence, more money and more control over your day-to-day tasks


– just to name a few perks.


But how do you get promoted? Isn’t it out of your hands?


Not really. Yes, the decision to be promoted is one your organization ultimately has to make.


But, by proactively pursuing a promotion, you drastically increase your chances.


So, what’s the best way to pursue a promotion? It comes down to two things:


acting in a way that’ll warrant a promotion and asking your boss for that promotion.


This article covers both.
